amendment.description: To make available from amounts available for National Guard Personnel, Army, $2,500,000 for Lewis and Clark Bicentennial Commemoration Activities, and to make available from amounts available or Operation and Maintenance, Army National Guard, $1,500,000 for such activities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1297 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1297 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Burns. (consideration: CR S9562-9563; text: CR S9563) To make available from amounts available for National Guard Personnel, Army, $2,500,000 for Lewis and Clark Bicentennial Commemoration Activities, and to make available from amounts available or Operation and Maintenance, Army National Guard, $1,500,000 for such activities.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1297 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Burns.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1297 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
